1.content:
So which boy do you want to gain? Here are you're choices:

Richard James (or RJ)
6 years old.
Short brown hair, caucasian, slim.
Likes to climb trees, play baseball, and watching TV.
His parents think he's underweight, so they try to get him to eat a lot.

Brian
8 years old.
Semi-short dark-blonde hair, caucasian, pudgy belly.
Likes playing video games, doing stuff on the computer, and wants to be an astronaut.
His mom works at a local bakery who often brings cakes and such home. He also has a 13 year old brother, Derek, who he likes to compete with.

Benji
4 years old.
Short ginger hair, caucasian with freckles, thin.
Likes his blanket, cookies, chocolate, and other sweets.
His parents are divorced and he lives with his mother who's working most of the day.

Alex
7 years old.
Short black hair, caucasian, overweight.
Likes food, and watching TV. He's also very lazy.
His parents have a higher income, so they can afford better things, but they aren't filthy rich.

Or do you want more choices?
1.title: Let's begin...

choices: She wants to know what type of cake he wants for his party.
11.content:
It was a hot summer day. There was hardly a cloud in the sky, but the sun's heat wasn't too unbearable.

RJ was lounging on one of the branches of the large tree in his backyard. He was wearing a black t-shirt and a pair of khaki shorts, he wasn't wearing any shoes because RJ liked the feeling of being bare-foot.

He was on summer vacation, so he didn't have to worry about school for a long time. His parents had also signed him up for little league baseball for the summer, which RJ did enjoy. Many of the boys on his team were either a bit older than he was, or just plain bigger than him. His parents seemed a bit worried about that, since RJ was their only child they wanted to make sure they were taking proper care of him, so they seemed to think RJ was not as big as he should be.

As RJ sat in the tree, he thought about his sixth birthday party, which was only three days from now. It was going to be a sleepover at his house with all his friends from school and the baseball team. What also seemed rather coincidental was that he had a baseball game the afternoon after the sleepover.

His thoughts were interrupted when his mom called him in.
11.title: RJ it is!

111.content:
"RJ, come in and get yourself ready, because we're heading out for some early birthday lunch!" His mother called him in from the back door and seeing RJ climbed off the tree and runs down for some excitement, despite he nearly forgot he was having a birthday night out early, just him and his parents.

"Yay! But where are we going, Mom?" He asked as he goes over to put on his trainers to head out with them.

"You'll find out and see, honey!" Mom replied with a wide smile and soon went out to the car, where his Dad was waiting in the car to drive them down to the restaurant, despite RJ doesn't know where they taking him for a treat.

There were so many choices to pick a restaurant that could satisfy their only son to add the beef to it. The fast food may be one of these he could eat without waiting to go hungry, or all you can eat restaurant where he can just pick out any types of food whatever he wants, and maybe some parents would give him more if they seemed to full enough indeed, although the costs is not extra in that case.

It only took a couple of minutes to travel by car when finally, they made a journey to the restaurant, but which one did they all went to for RJ's early birthday lunch?
111.title: An Early Birthday Lunch Surprise!

choices: The next day, at the park. (The day before the party)
Fast-Forward to the day of the party.
112.content:
"RJ!" called his Mom. "Could you come inside for a minute?"

Slightly annoyed by the interruption, RJ climbed down from the tree and went inside to the kitchen. His Mom had just come back from the store and she had about five shopping bags with her. "You wanted something, Mom?" asked RJ, looking at the bags on the counter top.

"Yes," said his Mom. "I just wanted to ask you what kind of cake do you wanted for your birthday."

"Well," started RJ. "Since a lot of kids will be here, I just want a regular chocolate cake. Something everybody will like."

"No, RJ," said his Mom. "That's not what I meant. Each boy will have their own cake to eat." She started unloading multiple boxes of cake mix from the shopping bags. "I want to know want you want on your cake"

"I get a WHOLE cake to myself?!" asked RJ, with surprise and delight.

"That's right," his Mother said. "So, what would like on your's?"

"I still want a chocolate cake," said RJ. "And...uh...why don't you surprise me?"

"Okay then," said his Mom. "That should be easy enough! I'll get started on these cakes right away. You can go back outside now."
112.title: Cake Choice

choices: RJ's parents have to leave for a few hours.
It's someone who was not invited.
1122.content:
At long last, the day RJ was looking forward to the most was finally here! He could hardly contain himself through-out the day (the party didn't start until 6 o' clock).

"Alright, am I the first one?" asked Matt (a portly, messy-brown haired boy who was RJ's best friend) as he came in. A sleeping bag in one hand and a wrapped box in the other.

"I guess you are," replied RJ. "Come on, let's go put your stuff in my room!"

As the hour ticked on, more boys arrived, each with their own sleeping bag and gift for RJ.

The second to arrive was Sam. He was also pretty chubby and had short blonde hair. Sam was also known to be a bit of a trouble-maker.

Max was the next show up. He had short curly brown hair, he also loved to skateboard.

Connor and his little brother Anthony came shortly after. They were african-americans with notable differences: Connor was overweight and had short brown hair, while Anthony was rather thin and had his head shaved. Anthony was rather openly jealous of his brother's bulk.

Next was Andrew, who had a noticeable pot-belly, freckles and short black hair. He was often calm and a bit of a math nerd.

A slightly-buff (but still rather slim) bright-red haired boy named Leo came next. Leo likes to work out alot, but like every other kid, he hates vegetables.

The last to arrive was Derek, a massive boy with slightly tanned skin and short black hair. He loved to eat, he'd eat anything that he could get his hands on and often complained about being hungry.

All the boys (including Anthony, who was younger) seemed very large when compared to RJ. Either because they had round guts or they were just simply taller. This of course made his parents irrationally concerned about RJ's health.

Once all eight boys had arrived, the party soon came into full swing. They all set up their sleeping bags in RJ's room, which had been cleared out for the most part for the party, and sat in there telling stories about their summer vacation.

"So then my older sister opened the hamper..." explained Sam. "...my pet mouse ran out and made her scream like crazy!" Many of the boys burst into laughter as they pictured the scenario Sam described.

"Man, girls are SUCH sissies!" chortled Max.

Before the boys could continue, the doorbell rang once again, only this time...
1122.title: RJ's party.

choices: RJ's too full to eat his cake.
11222.content:
"Boys! The pizzas are here!" called RJ's mom from the front door.

In a moment of uncontrolled chaos, all nine boys scrambled to the kitchen where 10 large pizza boxes had been stacked. Each boy had a whole pizza to themselves, except for RJ.

"I hope you don't mind having two pizzas..." said his mom. "...I didn't know if you wanted pepperoni or sausage tonight, so I got you both."

"That's okay, mom!" smiled RJ. "I'm STARVING!"

His mom hated to lie to him like that, but she couldn't come to accept her son's "unhealthy" size, so she ordered the extra one to help fatten him up. Besides, it was a special "10 pies for $25" deal.

Before long, all the boys had eaten their fill of the pizza and had gathered back in RJ's room. All the boys seemed quite content with their stuffed guts. RJ however felt rather sick. In the celebratory feeding frenzy, he'd managed to wolf down the first pizza, and had struggled to finish off the other one.

"Oh man..." moaned RJ. "...I think I ate too much...*burp*...."

"Had more than you could handle, RJ?" chuckled Connor, rubbing his own round gut.

"Yeah," said Sam, wrapping an arm around RJ and lifting his shirt so all the boys could see his double-stuffed belly. "You look like you swallowed a bowling ball!"

"I feel like I swallowed a bowling ball!" exclaimed RJ, massaging his exposed stomach. "I'm so full. I don't think I can even move..."

"I feel you," said Max. "Didn't you say we'd watch a movie or something at some point?"

"Oh yeah...*urp*" said RJ quietly. "Anyone else wanna watch a movie?"

All the boys agreed to the lazy idea, they then gathered in the living room and decided on a movie. It was the perfect way to let their stomachs digest while they still chatted and laughed about the activity.

Once the movie was over...it was time for cake!
11222.title: Pizza for everyone!

choices: They awoke to the smell of breakfast.
Everyone went back home the next morning.
112221.content:
"Time for cake!" yelled RJ's mom.

All of the boys slothfully made their way to the kitchen, their once lethargic expressions now beaming with joy at the sight of 9 cakes each placed in front of a chair.
They each sat in a chair and drooled at their own personal cake. Save for RJ, who looked at his with some fear.

It was a rather sizable chocolate cake with the words 'Happy Birthday RJ' in thick red icing. He certainly was delighted to have such a delicious treat on his birthday, but all that pizza still sitting in his rotund gut made him feel uneasy.

Before the other boys could get a chance to shove their own cakes into their faces, RJ's mom lit the candles on his cake and they all sang Happy Birthday rather hastily (at least it seemed so to RJ).

As soon as RJ's mom left the room, all the boys began shoveling big handfuls of cake into their mouths, moaning at the wonderful taste of the dessert.

"This is the best party EVER!" said Leo. "Pizza and LOTS of cake!"

"I know..." said Derek. "I think I'm starting to feel FULL for once in my life!"

After they finished laughing at the comment, they continued to eat away at their large cakes. RJ found it rather shocking how much those boys could eat, especially after all that pizza! RJ just couldn't help himself. Even though his belly was still full from the pizza, that cake was just so delicious to stop eating. He could feel his shirt growing tighter with each bit of cake he swallowed.

"I wish I could eat like this everyday!" said Anthony through a mouth full of cake. "Maybe then I'll be as big as Connor!"

"Yeah, keep dreaming, bro..." said Connor, shoving a massive handful of cake and practically swallowing it whole.

Once all the boys had managed to eat their fill (Derek actually ate his entire cake plus some of the others'), they laid back against their chairs literally none of their shirts could cover their stuffed-beyond-belief bellies. Occasionally someone would let out a small burp or hiccup, followed by a sigh of pleasure.

"That was the best..." sighed Matt. "Your mom sure knows how to feed growing boys, RJ." He patted his stomach and let out a hearty belch.

"I think I ate too much..." moaned RJ. "My tummy hurts."

He had really gone overboard. He didn't finish the whole cake, but there was hardly anything left over of the monstrous dessert.

"Okay boys, time for bed!" said Mrs. Anderson (RJ's mom) as she returned to the room.

"Thanks goodness..." whispered RJ, rubbing his stomach slowly.

All of the boys slowly managed to stand up and stagger their way back to RJ's room, their bloated bellies sloshing around as they did so. Everyone quite literally fell onto their sleeping bags and dozed of in a blissful food-coma.

RJ himself wanted nothing more that to stay absolutely still, and NOT EAT! His stomach was so full that he had a hard time just walking to his bed. Not to mention it was almost as big as a basket ball!

The boys slept peacefully through the night until...
112221.title: So...much...food...

choices: They lose because everyone is too stuffed.
It's not easy, but they win.
1122211.content:
After what seemed like a rather short night, the boys awoke to the smell of hot pancakes and bacon wafting in from the kitchen. Almost everyone sprang out of their sleeping bags and ran as quickly as they could, shouting things like: "Yay, breakfast!" "I'm starving!" or "It smells great!"

RJ, having witnessed this from his light sleep, slowly got up and rubbed his eyes. "How can they be hungry again so soon?" he thought, standing up.

As he started to leave his room, RJ glanced at the mirror hanging from his open closet door.
Hiss stomach wasn't nearly as big as it was last night, but it certainly wasn't the flat thing it was yesterday morning. He lifted his red shirt up to get a better look.
While still at little full from his birthday binge, his tummy had gained a very small layer of fat. He poked and pinched at it, giggling quietly as he did so.

When the smell of breakfast food finally got the better of him, RJ finally pulled his shirt back down and walked to the kitchen.

All the other boys had taken their places at the dinning table, and each where munching away at a stack of pancakes along with some scrambled eggs.

"Morning, sleepy head!" greeted RJ's Mom from the stove, making breakfast food by the pan-full. "Hurry up and eat! Your baseball game starts in less than an hour."

"That's right!" exclaimed RJ. In all the excitement, he completely forgot that the big game was today! "But should we really be eating this much?" he asked as he sat down at the table. "We might be too full to play."

"Nonsense," said his mom. "You boys are going to need your strength today. So make sure you eat every single bite."

"Okay..." said RJ, as a giant stack of pancakes was placed in front of him. Still unsure that all this excessive eating was good for them, RJ began eating the warm, fluffy, syrup-drizzled goodness.

After piles of pancakes, scrambled eggs, and what seemed like endless amounts of bacon, all the boys where once again stuffed to bursting.

"Dude, I want live here!" moaned Derek, rubbing his exposed gut. "My mom never lets me eat this much at home."

"Does she always make this much for you?" asked Matt.

"No..." said RJ, slumped in his chair. "Not really. It's kinda weird that she is giving me so much all of a sudden."

"Well enjoy it while you can!" said Matt, wrapping an arm around RJ's shoulder. "Stuff like this doesn't happen for long!"

"Hey guys!" said Sam, standing up and sucking in his stomach as best as he could. "I'm so full, I can't even see my feet!"

"Yeah? Well I'm the fattest one here!" said Connor, standing up and sticking his belly out.

"Not including me!" said Derek, pushing his belly against Connor's.

They continued to laugh and joke about how big they were until their parents came one-by-one to take them home to get ready for the game.

"You better get ready too," RJ's mom said after they waved goodbye to Matt and his dad.

"Right," said RJ, as he walked back to his room. His belly bouncing along the way.

When he came back to his room, he looked at himself in the mirror as he got undressed. His belly looked very big and round in comparison to the rest of his scrawny body. While he did find it fun to bounce and joke around with, RJ had a hard time feeling confidant that he could play baseball with such a fat stomach.

RJ had a bit of a difficult time getting his uniform to button up, considering he had grown quite a bit after eating so much. The uniform felt snug against his tummy, bit it fit no less. He had an even harder time trying to tie his shoe laces with his bloated gut in the way. He eventually had to get his mom to do it for him.

Soon, RJ and his mom got in the car and began driving to the baseball field. RJ quietly patted and rubbed his gut, which poked out from under his seatbelt.

"Is Dad going to be at my game today?" asked RJ.

"I'm afraid not, RJ." said his mom. "It may be summer vacation, but your dad still has to work on Monday. But don't worry, I'll record video of the game so he can watch it tonight when he gets home."

"Great," said RJ. "I'll be sure to do my best!"

When they arrived at the field, RJ made his way toward the rest of his team. Their stomachs were are still full and were pressing against their uniforms much like RJ's. Except Derek, who just left his last button undone, so now the world could see his belly button.

"So, did you all have fun a RJ's party?" asked Coach Burt.

"You bet we did!" exclaimed Matt. The other boys responded much the same with: "Yeah!", "It was awesome!", "Best party ever!" among others.

"Glad to see it went well. But I hope you're all ready for today's game!" said Burt. "Let's get out there and have fun!"
1122211.title: A big breakfast to start a big day

11222111.content:
RJ couldn't believe what had happened out on the field that day. The game was only 5 innings but to him it felt like 20! They lost the game 12 to 1, several moments of the game played over and over in RJ's head.

---

Bottom of the first with no runs, RJ took the mound. Once the boy on the other team was at the plate, RJ started to pitch. The weight of his stomach caught him off-guard and he stumbled forward, the ball flew right of the bat and into the out-field as RJ did a somersault onto his back.
Connor chased after the ball, but had to stop and catch his breath several times before he managed to reach it, by now the runner was on 2nd base.

Leo stretched his arm as high as he could to catch the ball from Connor, only to lose his balance and fall flat on his back, the ball landing three feet beside him. Not wanting to lift his heavy belly, Leo tried to reach the ball from where he was laying, only for the runner to dash right past him and straight to home.

---

Top of the second and they were down by 3. This was actually the high-light of their game!

Derek was on 3rd when Andrew hit a long one into the out-field. Andrew made it to first (granted, he was panting like crazy when he got there), and Derek trundled as fast as he could to home.

He tripped about half-way, but he didn't stop when he hit the ground, he managed to roll his way to home plate. Even body-checking the catcher as he passed, earning their only run.

---

Bottom of the third and they were still losing 5 to 1, RJ had gotten better at handling pitching...kinda. It was a pop-fly near first; an easy out. But when Max had made it over to the ball, he couldn't reach the ball because his gut was in the way.

"Come on..." he muttered as he stretched his arm further still.

His stuffed tummy could not be more in the way. He could hear his fellow teammates yelling: "Come on, Max!" "Get 'em out!" Max even got down on his knees, but the ball was just out of his hand's reach.

He made a bold effort and lunged himself forward slightly and finally felt the ball in his palm, he grabbed it and made his best effort to return to 1st base...only to find the runner crossing home plate.

---

Top of the fourth and the score showed 9 to 1, by some miracle they managed to get two runners on 1st and 2nd (maybe they were just going easy on them?)

Sam was at bat, although that round gut wasn't making easy for him to be in a bating position. Despite his added weight, he got a hit into the left side of the out-field.

He then began lugging himself to first base, those third helpings of pancakes relentlessly pulling his bulbous stomach to the ground.

"Gotta...keep...moving..." he muttered under his heavy breaths, his running (if you could call it that) slowing to a crawl.

Soon the ball found its way to 1st base: Sam was out, followed by Derek...then finally Leo.

---

That had to be without a doubt the worst game the team had ever played! And RJ couldn't have been more disappointed.

"I know you're upset you didn't win, sweetie..." said Mrs. Anderson softly as they drove home. "...but I know you guys will do better next season!"

"Maybe..." pouted RJ.

"The important thing is that you tried your best," explained his mom.

"We were too stuffed to try our best!" blurted RJ. "Everyone was too fat to play!"

"RJ, I think you might be overacting a little," said his mom.

"I don't think so, look at my belly..." RJ said, grabbing his still bulging stomach. "If we didn't eat so much we might've won!"

"Look..." began his mom. "You stayed up a little late last night, you've had a rough day, I think you just need to cool off."

RJ continued to silently pout for the rest of the car ride home, just wanting to forget the whole thing.

When they finally can home, RJ changed out of his baseball uniform and into a casual red shirt with brown shorts. He laid on his bed, staring distastefully at his stomach. The fabric of the shirt stretched tightly over the bulge in his gut.

"Stupid fat..." he muttered, lifting his shirt to look at his belly directly. "...weighing me down and..."

He grabbed at it in anger, wanting to just simply pull the extra weight off his body. But as RJ ran his fingers over his taut belly, he remembered how it made him feel earlier.
The sensation of the added curve to his body, jiggling it up and down when he jumped, his tummy sticking out his outie belly-button...

RJ got up and looked at himself in his closet mirror, his shirt still rolled up. He glanced at himself from the front, then he turned side-ways to see the real size of his gut. He stuck it out farther, pretending it was growing bigger, giggling as he did so.

Nearly all of RJ friends on the team had some belly fat, and they still played baseball fine enough (except if they're stuffed). RJ himself was starting to like his new belly. So maybe getting a little fat wouldn't hurt...

"Hey, Mom!" he yelled. "What are we having for dinner?"
11222111.title: They lose because everyone is too stuffed.

112221112.content:
Or...

You could go further into the future...
112221112.title: The next day

1122211122.content:
Since RJ gained that little bit of belly fat, he's been eating more often to make it grow. He's claiming to only eat a few times a week, but in reality, he's eating snacks in between meals.
Not light snacks, either. For a month he's been sneaking candy, chips, anything he could get ahold of to expand his belly outwards. He's taken a few days from Baseball Practice as well on account of "Tummyaches", some are legitimate, some are just so he can focus on eating.

After a month of eating, his belly was noticeable under all of his shirts. It stuck out like a sore thumb. He looked in the mirror and rolled up his PJ Shirt, to play with his belly. He enjoyed it a lot. His Mother was getting suspicious, though, so he's had to cut down so that he doesn't raise any eyebrows.
He ran downstairs, his belly jiggling like a beanbag chair, and sat down at the table for Breakfast. "Ooh, looks like you're getting a bit big for those shirts. Remind me to go to the store and get some bigger ones for you later today." RJ's mother said as he ate his cereal. "Sure thing. Can we also stop by the Burger Place for Lunch while we're out?" RJ asked. "Okay, but don't get too much. We don't want you getting TOO big." They both chuckled and continued with their mornings.
1122211122.title: The following month

choices: They buy the cloths and then go out to eat
11222111221.content:
At the stor RJ was trying on cloths but none of them fit.
"Mommy no clothes fit me." RJ said happily.
"It's ok sweetly I know what we can do go to the bigger sizes in the stor so that they can fit your growing body and still have room to grow . Dose that sound good to you?" asked his mom.
"Yes I want them supper big so I can become the fattest kid ever.RJ replayed in a supper tone.
"Let's make that dream come true RJ starting right now. Do you like that idea RJ?"
"Yes mom I love it and I want to be so fat I can't move."
"Great."
11222111221.title: At the Clothes Store

choices: Jump to first day of school
112221112212.content: It was 3 months later, and the last day of summer, and RJ was bigger than he ever imagined he would be....... He was too big even for the brand new shirts his mom had bought for him only 3 months ago, at an astonishing 150 pounds at 6 years old! His eating habits surpassed even Derek's and he showed no signs of slowing down!
112221112212.title: Jump forward 3 months later

choices: Continue to the start of the school day.
1122211122121.content: It was the first day of school and RJ was wearing a tight button up shirt and sweat pants his friends didn't know who he was because of his fater body.
1122211122121.title: Jump to first day of school

1122211122122.content: At the begining of the next summer RJ was a huge 415 pound 6 almost 7 year old. He was home schooled so he could always have food with arms reach. His bed room was moved into ten dining room.He has a queen sized bed 64 inch flat screed tv and tons of video games. The tv also has over 10,000 chanels and tons of movies the tv also is programmed to act like a computer so he can play computer games.
1122211122122.title: Jump to next summer

choices: His best friends: Joey, Ollie, and Chairle
12.content:
"Mom I'm home!!!" Brian called out after a long day at school. he threw his book bag on a chair and went into the kitchen.
"Man I'm starving," Brian said as he scratched his belly through the buttons of his mustard shaded school uniform.
"I need to get a new uniform," Brian thought," This shirt is getting tight".
And indeed it was. Brian's mom worked at a local bakery. She always brought home cookies and tarts and many other bakery items... by the box full. Over the years Brian and his brother Derek had rounded out because of their mother's treats. Derek being greedy was now a 190 pound 13 year old boy. He played defense on the school football team. That boosted his popularity. Often girls would come over and rub his belly or feed him treats. They would giggle when he let out belches. Even though Derek was more popular than Brian and they were very competitive, Derek still loved his little but growing brother and promised him that he would turn Brian into a fatty like him.
Brian fixed himself a bowl of potato chips, grabbed a liter of Pepsi, and plopped down in front of the television. He started grabbing chips by the handful and shoveling them into his mouth. When the chips were gone, Brian opened the Pepsi and began to chug the whole bottle. He laid a hand on his midsection as he felt it bulge outward with each swallow. He then finished the soda with a satisfied gasp. He then felt a bulge travel up his throat and bulge his cheeks out.
"Buuuuuuuuurrrrrrrrpppp!!!" Brian belched. As he burped a button popped off his shirt, exposing a sliver of white flesh. Brian then rubbed his bloated belly marveling how it sloshed around with fizzy liquid.He then heard some one come in through the front door.


Who is it?
12.title: Brian

choices: Brian and Derek fight over who gets to eat the cake.
Brian and Derek both eat the whole cake together.
121.content:
"Brian! Could you hold the door open for me?" his mom called from the front porch. "My hands are full."

"Ohh...fine." mumbled Brian. After drinking all that soda, Brian didn't feel like moving from his seat. But he reluctantly stood up and walked slowly to the front door, his bloated belly sloshing some-what noisily as he did so.

When he opened the door, he gaped at the towering confection his mom's trembling hands. It was a huge wedding cake intricately decorated with frosting along the rim of each of the three large layers.

"What's that?" said Brian in awe, his mouth starting to water at the sight of the monstrous dessert.

"Well..." grunted his mom as she slowly carried the cake through the door way and into the kitchen. "...this was going to be the Johnson's wedding cake. But apparently I used the wrong shade of beige when frosting it! I swear, those people want the whole world to revolve around them!" She carefully placed the cake onto the table, which creaked slightly under the weight of the dessert.

"I know how much you Derek like my baking, so I thought I'd bring it home instead of throwing it out. Does your uniform feel a little...snug?" she asked after noticing the skin poking out from under Brain's shirt.

"Huh? Oh...yeah," said Brian, tugging his shirt. "Maybe a little. It probably just shrunk in the wash or something."

"Maybe..." said his mom glancing at the microwave clock. "Listen, I've got to redo this whole wedding cake the right way, so I'll be home pretty late tonight. There are some cold-cuts you and Derek can reheat in the microwave, I won't have time to make dinner so help yourselves."

"Okay," said Brian.

"After dinner, it's straight to bed. Got it?" his mom said sternly.

"Got it," he griped.

"Good. Derek should get home from school any minute now. Both of you stay out of trouble now." she said, walking back to the door.

"We will!" said Brain right as she closed the door behind her.

After another button popped off of Brian's shirt, he decided to change into something more comfortable. He walked upstairs and into his room.
Brian's room was surprisingly tidy for a boy his age, mainly because the he mostly just played games on his computer, so he didn't have alot of toys and such. He did have quite a few posters of planets and all sorts of things one might find in space.

He entered his closet and changed into a simple blue t-shirt and grey shorts. They both fit him, but they were quite stretched against his pudgy gut.

After he'd changed, he heard the front door open and his brother's voice yell: "Hey! I'm home!"
121.title: His mom brought home a GIANT cake

1212.content:
"Hey little bro," greeted Derek as Brian descended the stairs. "How was your day at school?"

"Oh, you know, same as always..." said Brian.

"BORING!" they said together.

Despite their constant competing (with school work, video games, or just even eating) Brian and Derek shared a rather friendly rivalry. Even though they teased or insulted each other all the time, everyone knew these two got along just fine.

"Now that our long hours of boredom are over, how about I mop the floor with you on the Xbox?" said Derek.

"Oh, we'll see about that, chump!" said Brian, racing his brother to the seat closest to the TV.

The afternoon soon withered away into the evening as the boys fought against each other in numerous video games. Dishing out their normal friendly banter as they played.

Soon enough, their stomachs started growling loudly over their laughing.

"Guess it's time to eat," said Derek, patting his empty belly. "What's for dinner?"

"Mom's working late tonight, so she said we could have some of the leftover chicken," said Brian, getting up and walking into the kitchen.

"That's it?!" whined Derek, as he followed Brian. "Man, I wanted alot more food than just some cold chicken!"

As Brian popped the tupperware contents on a plate and into the microwave, Derek suddenly noticed the big wedding cake sitting on the kitchen table. His eyes widened at the sight of the sugary mountain.

"What's this...?" he said quietly, still enamored by the towering dessert.

"Hmm?" said Brian, pulling the re-heated leftovers out of the microwave. "Oh, that! Mom brought it home today. She said we could eat it."

"Forget that measly chicken, Bri'. We're eating THIS for dinner!" said Derek happily.

"Are you sure?" said Brian, looking at the beautifully prepared cake with his brother.

"Why not?" said Derek, then a sly smirk spread across his face. "What's the matter? Too much food for my little bro' to handle?"

"Don't you think Mom might get mad at us for eating it all?" asked Brian. "Hey, what do you mean that too much for me?! I could eat FIVE of these if I wanted to!"

"I'd like to see you try, short-stuff!" taunted Derek.

"You're on!" said Brian.

With that after gulping down the scrawny leftover chicken, both boys climbed onto the chairs by the table and started shoveling handfuls of the discarded wedding cake into their mouths.

When it came to making desserts, no one could compare to how Brian and Derek's mother did it. Everything she made tasted incredible, and this cake was no exception. Brian enjoyed every bite of the scrumptious cake as he ate. But he hardly had time to savor the flavor, for Derek was scarfing away a the cake even quicker that he was!

Frosting was spattered all over their fingers and lips, but when it came to filling their guts...these boys ate like real boys would.
As they continued to eat, both boys could feel their bellies press against their shirts as more cake was crammed into them.

Brian's light blue tee slowly began to rise up and reveal his expanding stomach. When they got to the point were they could sit in their chairs and eat, Brian was glad he changed into his stretchy elastic shorts. Those jeans he wore to school would have been WAY too tight.

Finally, all that remained of the cake was either still on the platter or on Brain and Derek. Who were sitting slouched in their chairs and breathing heavily. They'd licked their fingers clean so they could pat and rub their stuffed guts.

"Oh man...*BUUURP*...that was great..." moaned Brian. He lifted his shirt up more so he could rub the tight flesh on his chubby tummy.

"Yeah...Mom makes the best treats ever..." said Derek, letting out an even louder belch.

"I love eating like this..." said Brian. "...then my belly gets all round and heavy..."

"Me too..." said Derek.

"Well..." said Brian as he stretched and yawned, "I think I'll go to bed now. I'm beat."

"Yeah, after a meal like that, I just wanna take a nice long nap..." agreed Derek.

13.content:
Benji half-awoke bright and early as his Mommy kissed his forehead---she was going to work; she'd be home late that night but Mrs. Cardwell next door was home as always if he needed anything, there was lunch in the fridge already made for him, don't open the door to strangers and she loved him so much. The sweet freckly little tot smiled sleepily.

"Wuv you too Mommy," he mumbled, snuggling back up into Mr. Blanket, his soft blankie that went everywhere with him. He heard her lock the front door and rolled over, going back to sleep. It was a few hours later when he woke up, his flat little tummy rumbling. Time for some breakfast! With a yawn he sat up and hopped out of his big-boy bed, dragging Mr. Blanket behind him. The plate of lunch Mommy had left for him was waiting as promised---yaay, hot dogs and grapes! But what really excited Benji was the big bowl of chocolate pudding sitting beside it, just calling his name. Mommy had made it for a get-get together of ladies from her work tomorrow, but she wasn't here and he REALLY liked chocolate! It couldn't hurt to just have a taste, right? Just to make sure it was good before his Mommy gave it to her friends? It might be yucky and then Mommy's friends would be mad at her. He was helping her! His tummy agreed this was a good idea, giving a loud growl that shook his whole belly. The bowl was nearly as big as Benji, so he spread Mr. Blanket out and set the bowl on it, dragging it into the living room by one corner. He wriggled up onto the sofa and spent the morning cuddled under his blankie watching cartoons and eating pudding. By the time the afternoon rolled around and the cartoons switched to boring grownup shows, the bowl was empty and Benji's tummy was as round as a soccer ball. Oops. He hadn't meant to eat all of it, it was just so good he couldn't seem to help himself! He'd make her some more later; Mommy always had the things to make pudding because it was one of Benji's favorites.

But in the mean time, what to do now? Remarkably, Benji was still a tiny bit hungry despite his bulging belly. He could try to eat the plate of lunch Mommy made him, the hot dogs and grapes. Or, he could go over to old Mrs. Cardwell's house next door; she'd be fixing lunch right about now and she always said Benji was welcome any time. She might be making her famous berry pie or even chicken and dumplings! Or, he could look around in the cabinets and see what else there might be that was good to eat. He could even make a new bowl of pudding and surprise Mommy!

14.title: Alex

141.content:
Dr. Feedar has never been a fan of skinny children but he cannot go against the wishes of the boy's parents. If he wants the boy to gain weight, then he will need to be sneaky about what prescriptions to give him to gain the most weight possible.

As his parents leave the room, he goes over to console the crying child. "Now, now, Alex. I'm not going to make you loose weight if you do not want to, but I still have to honor your parents wishes."

"But, I like my belly!!! All the healthy my mom makes me eat is gross and I don't want too!! I want to eat pizza, ice cream, mac and cheese and, and now you are going st starve me to death..." Alex starts to well up in tears again. His round belly jiggling as he breaths in trying to hold back tears.

"Now hold, on. What did I just say? You are not going to loose weight. I may accidentally write the wrong prescription, Which may have some "weight gaining" side effects. And you will continue your diet as usual and trust me, you will see the results. Alex starts to simmer down from his tantrum as Dr. Feedar starts explaining al that he will do to "loose weight". It making Alex's stomach rumble just thinking about all the food that he can eat. "Now, in order for this to work, I need to take some measurements from you.

Alex steps toward Dr. Feedar and over to the wall to take his height. "Ok, 48 in. Now step to the scale." He steps over to the scale and the electronic number settle on 95 lbs. Wow. That is a big number for your age. Are you sure that you want to gain more?"

Alex looks ecstatic about the number readings. "Yea, as long as I get to eat, I don't care how big I get!"

"Good" Says Dr. Feedar. "We wouldn't want that belly to go away, now would we?" He pokes his belly, and it swoshes up and down from the poke. I am going to take a few more measurements and then your parents can come back in. He starts measuring the different parts of his body. His rotund belly, this thick arms, and his softened chest which now have some soft boy boobs.

He then opes the door and motions his parents to come in. "Despite the original protestations from your son. I have seemed to convince him to loose the weight." He gives a subtle wink at Alex. "Further more, to not upset him further, he will continue his diet as normal as if he is not even trying to loose weight. Thanks to the power of medicine, he can eat whatever he wants and not gain a single pound." Alex had never smiled more now than he has in his entire life. Dr. Feedar continues,"Loosing weight should be fun for children and my new diet and medicine should work like a charm. Be sure to pick up this prescription right in the clinic pharmacy when you leave. The sooner the better. Make sure he eats a large healthy meal for dinner tonight to get the medication working properly." He writes down and signs the prescription and hands it to his parents who blindly accepts the advise given by this doctor. They are just about to leave and go out the door. "Wait!" They all turn around. "I only save these for my most special patients and I think you deserve one for being such a good sport." Dr. Feedar leaves the examination room and goes to his office and gets out a very large 4" across in diameter lollipop. "This is just for you. Don't for get what we talked about!"

The family leaves the room and Alex content with his lollipop ever salivating, waiting for his next meal. They go up and pick up the prescription from the pharmacy.

His dad, Who didn't really approve of Alex loosing weight in the first place says" Well, Alex. Where do you want to go to eat tonight for dinner? You were such a good boy today.
141.title: you have to go on a diet

1412.content:
Alex is having a hard time choosing because there are so many places to choose from that his belly heaves in hunger just thinking about it. Then it hit him! He had to eat at the fattiest, most delicious place in town: Pattie Queen! It was his all time favorite restaurant and the burgers are just to die for!

"Can we go to Pattie Queen, daddy!?" he started to bounce up and down with excitement.

"Of course, son. You earned it." Alex stops bouncing and runs straight to the car and nearly runs out of breath doing so. "Was it always this hard to run around like that?" He thinks to himself. "I'm getting to fat for this."

"Remember, honey. Not too much. You are still trying to loose weight." Says his mom.

"Now honey bunch. Remember what the doctor said. He can eat whatever he wants and as long as we are taking the pills, he will not gain a pound." said his dad.

"Yes, I know, but he still needs to try the healthy foods and be act..."

"Give the kid a break, he's just a kid! The weight will come right off when he is older. You know, you worry too much about him. He'll be fine,"

"Come on, mom!!! I'm hungry!!!" She sees that he is already at the door visibly out of breath.

"Coming, son!" she hurries to the door hoping he hasn't ordered the entire menu yet.

The cashier looks disgustedly at the chubby adolescent but he didn't care. All he cared about was all the food about to be in his belly. They paid for the food and sit down and had it all brought to them.

"Don't forget to take your medicine, Alex" He pops out 2 yellow pills and hands them to Alex as he is being handed his large coke. He takes them, swallows them, and washes them down with a big swig of coke.

As the rest of his food is being delivered, Alex's eyes opened wide and nearly popped out of his head at the sight of such spectacular food. He unwraps the Texas double cheese burger with a full half-pound of all beef meat patty, with 3 slices of american style cheese, lettuce, tomato, pickles, onions, loads of secret sauce and topped with 4 slices of thick, crispy bacon. He takes a big bite and he is over come with sweet, savory bliss. Greese and sauce slowly drip from his chubby cheeks. Bite after bite, his belly is ever more filled with empty calories going straight to his ever growing belly.

His mother looks over and sees how he is enjoying his eating and how truly happy he is. Maybe she is over reacting about his weight?

He is about half way done with his burger when he gets started on his fries. He slathers them with ketchup and eats them by the fist full. He soon gets bored with that and puts the rest of the ketchup stained fries and puts it on his burger where he has to open his mouth extra wide to fit all of that sandwich in. Even though he is not even half way done with his meal, his mother's recent healthy cooking has made his stomach smaller and not as able to handle this food like he used too. More and more he is shoving into his over stuffed belly. Hist shirt is starting to ride up showing his deep belly button. He greedily shoves into his mouth the rest of his burger and takes a big swig of coke. He is breathing heavily from all the food he has had so far.

"Come on, Alex. Eat up. You had me order all of this food and now you don't want to eat it?" His dad snickers at him. Almost daring him to eat more. His mother adds in.

"You know the rule in our house. You must finish what you have on your plate or you get no dessert!" She takes away his 32oz milkshake. No, Dessert!!!! With a new found vigor he returns to eating the rest of his chicken nuggets and the last of his left over fries. Every bite is getting harder and harder to finish. He slides the last ketchup stained chicken nugget into his mouth and swallows it almost whole. He did it!!!

BUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRP!!!

The whole restaurant looks back at him. Alex only laughs. After such a big burp he now has a little more room for his milkshake. But he was to tired to really think about his dessert. He reaches out for his milkshake from his mom with the most content and cutest eyes she had ever seen clearly struggling to breath with all the food he shoved into his gut. He stands up from the booth, more belly exposed than when they entered and having trouble keeping his balance with all the food in his enlarged belly. His father comes in and picks him up as best he can. (His father is clearly ripped) With his milk shake in hand filling his overstuffed belly all the way home. Alex slurps down the last of his milkshake in complete bliss. He hopes he can eat like this every day. With his new "diet" and pills taking action, how far in the future are we going to see Alex?

"Oh, okay. You earned it my little piglet!" She hands him back his shake

14123.content:
After many months and months of feeding Alex all the food he could possibly fit into his belly, it really took a toll on his weight. His weight ballooned up well into morbid obesity by now. This would be his eighth month of his parents giving in to every indulgence, letting him have every snack whenever he wanted and filling his belly with more than enough delectable foods than his belly would ever be able to handle. The month was now June with summer in full force. The sun was beating in his hometown giving Alex all the more reason to stay in the house. However, this was a special day for Alex because this was his birthday on June 8, 2012. He will be turning 8 years old today bigger and better than ever. His mom just brought him home from an amazing day at the arcade with all of his friends. He comes waddling through the door with a big smile on his chubby, round face. This was not only because he had just beaten the high score on the video game called "Western Shoot-out", but by beating that high score and being the birthday boy, he won a free large pizza! Which he happily devoured and enjoyed every single greasy bite all by himself. Of course, he had help from his friends cheering him on. They knew he could do it with some encouragement and someone running over to refill his soda.

Content, he comes home with a sense of accomplishment and a full belly stuffed with pizza, soda, and lots and lots of cake. It was every young boy's dream. He comes in and immediately sits over on the couch and starts to play on his Xbox system. His mother comes in shortly afterward carrying all the gifts people gave him at the arcade. She starts putting them away in his room
"Honey, aren't you going to change out of your shirt before you play your game?" He continues playing with the only response is the video game noises coming from the TV.

"Alex, pause." He pauses the game.

"But, mom. My room is so far away and I'm tired. I've been on my feet all day and I need couch time."

"Well at least change out of that shirt, it's dirty." She is referring to the white tank top with the state of Texas on it saying "Everything is Bigger in Texas". It was
covered with stains from the pizza sauce. He still insisted on wearing it even though it stopped fitting him a couple of months ago. It really failed to contain his weight as it didn't cover all of his belly. When he sits down it rides up his belly showing his deep belly button and fat spills out the sides.

"Ugg. Fine." He raises his arms up. His mother tries to remove his shirt but it has been so tight that she had to tug and pull. Finally, it comes off! The end result of constant eating and indulgence. All of his fat spills out onto his lap nearly covering his blue athletic shorts (not that he really used him, to begin with). He tries
to go back to playing his video game.

"Nuh-uh. Not yet. We still have to measure you against the wall. We do it every year, remember?" The only response was video game noises. "Alex, if you don't do this, you won't get to see your new gift."

He looks over at his mother and pauses the game. "Gift, I thought you gave me all the gifts at the arcade?"

"Almost. Come on, Alex. Let's measure you." Alex heaves himself off his big butt and waddles his way into the kitchen where the wall where he will be measured.

His dad was waiting there with a camera, a clipboard, a scale, a measuring tape, a bottle of whipped cream, and a triple-decker moon pie waiting just for him. He immediately notices the moon pie and reaches for it. It's just his favorite: a chocolate-covered moon pie with a side of whipped cream. He wasn't even hungry but just out of instinct he chows down like he has not eaten in a month. He quickly downs it with whipped cream shooting it right into his mouth, filling it with as much as it can handle. With Alex pacified, filling his belly, his dad puts a tick mark next to the crown of his head. Alex moves away, finishing his dessert. "You are getting taller, Big Boy. You grew 4 in this last year. You are now up to 4' 4"." He then gestures to the scale. Alex was about to get on the scale and then, "Now wait, Alex. Is that how we finish food this house?" He points at the only half-full can of whipped cream."You need to finish it or else you won't have a happy belly." He pats his son's now overstretched belly. He takes the can of whipped cream and starts to fill Alex's mouth. Alex opens wide ready for the rest of his creamy dessert. He was truly living the dream. With each swallow of whipped cream, he is sent into a world of creamy goodness, filling his belly slowly past the point of being full. Alex's dad empties the last of the whipped cream into the bottomless pit that is his son's stomach. "Now, was that so bad? Isn't your tummy happy now?" Alex starts to rub his swollen tummy.

"Yes, dad." He now steps up on the scale. It keeps going up and up until it settles on 174lbs. Alex tries to look down at what it says but is having trouble seeing around his belly now that it's been stuffed with whipped cream. "What does it say? How big am I now?"

"It says you have grown up to be a big, strong boy!" His mother chimes in.

"It says 174 lbs. You are getting so big. I'm so proud of you!" He gets showered with compliments. He can't help but blush a little. "Alright son, say cheese." She takes a picture of him trying to flex his now fat encased muscle; fat is just drooping from his arms. He is also holding a small dry erase board that has his age and weight that he is resting perfectly on his tummy and his double chin. He poses with no shirt on letting all of his fat hang down its all of its glory. Love handles, tummy, arm fat, and all.

Age 8 at 174 lbs.

"Ok, its time for your final gift" They lead him over to his master bedroom to reveal his gift. It was a fully stocked big grey Lazy Boy recliner with built-in cup holders and a tray table to hold lots of food. It also came with some plugs and USB port to charge his phone and devices. Right next to it was a fully stocked mini-fridge packed to the brim with soda and snacks within close reach as well as a TV with a brand new Nintendo Switch system at the ready next to it. They both say, "Happy Birthday, Alex!"

Alex's eyes and mouth open as wide as they possibly can. "Is that all for me?" He says as he waddles over as fast as his fat legs will carry him.

"Of course, son. This is what you wrote down on your birthday list, right?" And right they were. He did write it down but he didn't think that they would be able to afford all of these things. "You are happy with it, right?"

"AM I!!!!" He immediately takes a seat in his new Lazy Boy. It's as if this chair was designed specifically for him. in a comfortable bliss, he wearily says, "I'm never moving from this spot ever again. I love you all. This is everything I ever wanted." He lifts his arms um gesturing for a hug from his parents.

"We love you too." They both gather around the recliner and hug his soft, fat body.

"All right. Let's look and see what this bad boy can do." His dad picks up the remote for the recliner. It can recline back, go back to normal and it raises itself so you can stand up without any effort. He is lifted out of the chair to pick up the Nintendo Switch only to sit back down. He opens the mini-fridge and pops open a Dr. Pepper and grabs the cookies right next to them and starts chowing down as he boots up the system and starts to play a game. "Happy birthday, son" He turns to go out the door. He turns back to look at his son right as he is about to shut the door. He is now intently playing his game and mindlessly shoving cookies down his throat. His fat body is spread out for all to see not knowing how fat he is. (Or even caring) He will be here where he will be safe. My son is fed, he is fat, and he is happy. He is living the life all boys dream of. That is all I could ever want from my son.

Something special always happens at Christmas for this young child or, should it be some other day in the year?

1412312.content:
It was that time of year again for Alex to go back to school. Of course, Alex was not ready for this because he had spent all summer gorging himself with food, playing video games, and waking up whenever he felt like it. In fact, they were late leaving for school this morning. After all, Alex had to eat his "healthy-sized" breakfast before he did anything. It's not like they would be able to move the kid anyway once he was set on eating something. As he was scarfing down his 4th dinner plate-sized waffle, his mother came over to him. "Make sure you eat as much as you can because you may not be able to eat as much as you want now that you are going back to school."

His eyes widen at the fact. "But mom! I want to eat when I get to school." His dad chimes in.

"Well, we are writing a note that says you need to have 2 lunches and access to snacks. If they don't we will make a ruckus until they do. No one tells my son when they can and can't eat." He steals a piece of bacon from his overloaded plate of food.

"Hey!!!! That's mine! And why can't you do home school? My friend Billy went to home school." He wolfs down more of his sausage.

"Alex." His mom comes over with another full plate of food. "You know we can't afford to. Your father and I still have to work. And especially after seeing your food bills." She pats his tummy and places a full plate of bacon and eggs. "Now eat. You still haven't finished your first course, yet."

After his massive breakfast, he finally gets to school utterly stuffed to the brim with all breakfast foods imaginable about 30 minutes late. When he opens the door to the classroom...

BUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRP

He walks into the classroom with everyone's mouth wide open. Alex, completely oblivious to his own obesity waddles over and tries to sit down in the desk, but his belly simply won't fit. "Umm, Teacher. Do you have a bigger desk? My tummy won..." CRASH!

He is now on the floor, his belly still jiggling from the sudden movement. He broke the desk he was trying to sit at. The desk simply could not handle his new 180 lbs frame. He rolls over and tries to get up but with no success. Almost gasping for air now after several failed attempts to get on his underused feet he says, "Teacher, I can't get up!" The teacher and some of the bigger, stronger 3rd graders struggle, but eventually get him up. One of the boys that helped him up was named Riley. He was a lot more muscular than a lot of 3rd graders but was still skin and bones compared to the others. And especially when compared to Alex. The boy on the other side named Billy. He was a friend that has to know Alex for a while now. Last time he saw him, he was only a little chubby. He is a little chubby himself at only a mere 100 lbs. They set him down in a chair built for adults breathing quite heavily now.

"Dang, dude." Says Billy. "I knew you were getting fat, but dang you're getting fat." He gives his belly a playful slap. It jiggles for a while before settling again.

"Yea," says Riley. "How does a kid get this fat." He gently pokes his belly fat. Alex, still panting, points to his backpack.

"I need food. Hand me my bag." Riley hands him his back form his broken desk. Alex opens the bag as it is loaded mostly with snacks that could feed an army. He immediately un-wraps 2 triple-decker moon pies and shoves as much as he can into his mouth.

"Ah. That's why."

"Alright, class. Take your seats. It's time to start class now that that is over."

The rest of the school for the week was of a similar schedule. Everything was just difficult for young, fat Alex now that he was huge. He still made friends like Billy and Riley. In fact, they even started to buy extra food for him and stuffed him with snacks during the day. Everyone was just enamored by his massive weight. He was the biggest in the whole school. Students would ask him to touch his belly. They would ask to come over to his house. He would even offer his new friends snacks. His weight, however, was really starting to take a toll on his legs. He even had to take breaks walking through the lunch lines every day to get his second lunch. His parents gave him a gift that would change him forever. What will his parents do to help him deal with the struggle of school?

After a long day at school, Alex came home all red and sweaty from the short way from the car to his home. He immediately takes off his shirt and makes his way to his awesome Lazy Boy Recliner takes a large soda from his mini-fridge and chugs it. His parents come in with a large plate filled with half a family-sized bag of pizza rolls. They notice his legs are red and swollen from all the walking he has been doing at school.

"Honey, what happened to your legs?" First thing's first, he grabs thee massive plate of pizza rolls from her hands and shoves them in his mouth like he has not eaten in ages. An hour without eating for Alex is almost a lifetime. In between big mouth fulls of pizza rolls, he would state all the horrors of being at school. Like they would make him walk everywhere, they would not let him eat as much as he wanted, he didn't have enough lunchtime for the amount of food he would bring, and lastly, they made him go outside and play with the others encouraging physical activity. Not that he would of course. In fact, what really set his parents off was the fact that they took his food away from him trying to get him to move around more. Just talking about school started to make him cry and shove more pizza rolls into his mouth at a way faster rate. It was simply the last straw.

"You won't have to worry about those mean old teachers anymore. We will have a stern talking too with the principal tomorrow. How about I make you your favorite? Mac and cheese with extra bacon? Would you like that?" Alex plops the last pizza roll into his mouth and feebly nods his head. His eyes are red from the crying and some remnants of the tears have mixed with the pizza sauce on his fat, chubby face. His mother wipes his face off and dries his tears. His father comes in with a bag of cookies and a large glass of milk.

"Eat this until dinner is ready. You have been a good boy today so you get the extra good and fattening snacks today!" With a renewed sense of vigor, he immediately digs into the cookies now resting on his jiggly belly alternating between a cookie in his right hand and his glass of milk in his left. Having a big belly does have its perks after all.

After a stern talking to the school administration, he can now eat as much as he wants whenever he wants to so long as it does not disturb the class and their learning environment. He can have up to 3 lunches now. One that his parents make him, one in the lunch line, and another during recess. With Dr. Feedar's clearance, he has been taken out of P.E. and now has an extra lunchtime where he can go to the cafeteria and get another lunch. With that, his parents present him with a brand new electric wheelchair. Now he does not have to walk ever again. It has an adjustable desk that swings out from side to side and up and down to fit his growing belly. The seat his much bigger than he is but is quite comfortable as it anticipates his growing size later down the line. It has all the things a fat boy will ever need. Charging ports for his devices, a large adjustable cupholder, and several compartments to hold many snacks. Alex, even dropped what he was eating to stare in awe at such a wonderful contraption.

Now he never has to walk again unless it was to go to the bathroom or the small space between the recliner and his new wheelchair. He will spend most of his time in this chair or in his lazy boy recliner. He arrives at school and the kids are very excited to see Alex with this really neat contraption tricked out with all those spaces for his snacks and by the sheer amount of weight this kid has. His belly jiggles for quite a while when he starts and stops. His school work has improved now that he does not have to worry about lugging his 188-pound frame. They do not even make him wear the school uniform with a button-up shirt because he has grown out of the bigger sizes they have. With his 3 lunches at school, kids giving him snacks and their leftover food, this makes his already useless legs even more useless. His legs are no longer red and swollen but are now swollen up by all the fat he has put on over the course of a month. He has gained 8 lbs and is now eaten himself to 188lbs at the age of 8. He only has a double chin now, working on a third. Even without a uniform, he starting to burst out of his clothes and his shorts are getting tighter than ever. You wouldn't notice because his belly covers almost to his knees now and every roll of fat is heaving with food.

One day at school his friends, Billy and Riley come by to Alex. They noticed that he is struggling to open up a compartment in his Wheelchair that has his snacks in it. His love handles are getting too big. What happens next?

One last double glazed doughnut after his gargantuan feast.

Panting, practically gasping for air, he pitifully looks at his audience, "I don't know if I can do this." His chat immediately blows up with words of encouragement! EAT IT! EAT IT! EAT IT!!!!

He musters up the last of his strength, his tummy still protesting and takes a big bight at the delectable morsel. He finally slides the last piece in his gaping maw and swallows. He finished. The chat roars with cheers and words of encouragement!

155222232.content:
"Hmmm... I wonder where to start?" Lewis wondered and started looking around and heads over to the food court by the pool, so that he could try and get something to eat from there.

Of course, there is a food court which has some multiple stalls, filled with wide range to choose from. Foods like ice-cream, pizzas, burgers, and other things where people can enjoy whilst spending time at an outdoor pool. Lewis in other hand is actually a regular, as far as eating and relaxing was concerned, he knew that he was very good at sneaking into place, and even downplay some staff, so that they'll be convinced to give him food what he wants, or feed him if you will.

"Well, I guess I can have time for food I suppose, if I could do this my way!" That was Lewis' statement with that smirk on his face, and soon waddled over and gets to the food court.

Whilst being there, there are many people already gathered to have some refreshments, even if that meant that an eight year old bully was gonna have to wait than usual to get his appetite. He just didn't liked being patient when his stomach had growled in hunger, so he needed to think of something to do this in quick time.

"This is a reason why I hate this kind of waiting. Besides, I should be the one to get fed more than they do. But I just know how to do it though." Lewis says with a sigh to begin with, before he had that expression look, to know he's got something on his sleeve.

It didn't take long for an obese youngster to think, and soon he goes for it by...
155222232.title: The Food Court By The Pool

choices: Start eating more to get bigger
155231.content:
Christopher and five of his friends were over at his house on a Friday. As usual they were wrestling on a mattress having a great time together. Up now was David and Randy. David was 6 years old, a pudgy kid one of Chris' best friends. He had a big appetite and a great sense of humor. While Randy was 5, a fat boy with a bit of a temper and loved eating. They were both getting ready to go up against each other.

"You're definitely going to lose to me this time," Randy said with a little smirk. "Today I have a better strategy than last time."

"Are you sure? Because I won the last two times against you." Said David very confident in himself.

"Fine," rage starting to build up in Randy. "If I win you will buy me anything from McDonalds, and if you win I'll buy you anything from McDonalds."

"I accept your challenge," David said cracking his knuckles. Both of the boys took off their shirts revealing their rounder stomachs. They wrestled for about ten minutes when David finally won against Randy. Randy threw one of his tantrums as he usually did after losing. Next was Chris and Manny. Manny was 4, and had an enormous pot belly. Chris already knew he would lose. Chris always saw these fights unfair, considering everyone there was bigger than him. With no problems Manny was able to take down Chris and won.

Later that day when everyone had gone back home and Chris was all alone lying down on his bed, a thought popped up in his head. 'Maybe if I get bigger I could beat my friends at wrestling.' This thought had settled in his head for a while now, and he had made his decision. He decided he would...
155231.title: Christopher Pierce

info.brief_description: Little boys start to put on weight and get fat!
info.description:
This story is about young male kids who are gaining.

The rules are:

-Keep the boys under the age of eight.
-No killing off the characters.
-No vore.
-No sex or porn (these ARE kids!)
-No gay or lesbian stuff (While I do support it, it's not what I want for this story).
-No girls weight gain.
-No spells, magic, or any other abnormal means of gaining weight.
-No instantly gaining 4,000 lbs. in one meal or anything like that.
-Please use correct spelling and grammar.
-No one sentence chapters, they should at least be three paragraphs each.


Try to retain their character descriptions as best as you can and keep the story going as much as possible.
